text:
Question 01) Adelfos Yo Soy as Las People that Mi Tierra Viniero - Soy de la Raza Mora, Vieja Amiga del Sol -, that all the ganaron y All lonton.
Tengo El Alma de Nardo del Arab Espa√±ol.
Accessed on: 22 Oct. 2015 (fragment).
In this stanza, Spanish poet and playwright Manuel Machado reflects on
A) your plural identity formation.
B) the nomadic condition of their ancestors.
C) the loss suffered with the migration process.
D) the debt of the Spanish people to the Arab people.
E) its identification with the elements of nature.
